hero.title: Sicherer Shmues Ohn Kompromis
hero.description: OpenChat iz a shmuess-platform mit sof-tsu-sof farshlislung. Keyn telefon-nummer, onentzentralizirt af design, un aleyn open source. A perfekte oyfshpas far di, vos hobn a groyse libshaft far privatkeyt – mit a bissele shpits fun humor!
features.section_description: Erlebn di tsukunft fun zichere shmues mit funktsyonen vos shteln far bashitshn dayne privatkeyt un farshtern dayne kommunikesye – un mit a leykhe bissele far di lebn!
features.e2ee.title: Sof-tsu-sof Farshlislung
features.e2ee.description: Ale nachrichten vos zaynen geshikt vegn OpenChat zaynen farshlislert op dayn geret, un ken nor dayn empfenger zey entshlisln. Oyb a nar intersepts di daten, vel er nor a haufen onlesleche teychim zein!
features.no_phone.title: Identitet Ohn Telefon-Nummer
features.no_phone.description: Anders vi andre shmues-apps, fregt OpenChat keyn telefon-nummer far a konto. Dos shutzt dayne privatkeyt un makht der service zuganklich far yeder mit a internet-verkher – mit sichere identitetn basirt af kriptografishe kleys.
features.decentralized.title: Onentzentralizirte Arkhitektur
features.decentralized.description: Batzirt af farbindene databases vos zaynen gehost fun yuser in der cloud, makhn a shtarker netz vos ken nisht gefaln mit an eykh klap fun fingern!
features.open_source.title: Open Source
features.open_source.description: Der kode iz fargeshnoybn un oysgeton, vos yeder ken oyskiken, ubeyrn un bakumen. Keyn geheymn tor – alles opklor!
features.european.title: Yuropeyish Nokh Design
features.european.description: OpenChat iz 100% gemakh in Yurope, mit yuropeyishe werte far privatkeyt. Folln GDPR un keyn Silicon Valley ozoy – gevezn!
how_it_works.section_description: Zog mir, vi der digitaler magye shtot in OpenChat? Farsteh di teknologye bakn a zichere un onentzentralizirter shmues-platform – a maysel fun digitaler magye!
how_it_works.step1.title: Onentzentralizirter Database-Netz
how_it_works.step1.description: OpenChat fiyrt farbindene databases vos zaynen gehost fun di yuser in der cloud. Anders vi tsentralizirte apps, shafn mir a netz fun farbindene knoydn, yeder farshlislend daten. Dos heyst keyn eynik punkt fun feler un keyn tseyn tsentral organisatsye vos kikht oyf dayne shmuesn.
how_it_works.step2.title: Sof-tsu-sof Farshlislung
how_it_works.step2.description: Ale nachrichten vos zaynen geshikt vegn OpenChat zaynen farshlislert op dayn geret, un ken nor dayn empfenger zey entshlisln.
how_it_works.step3.title: Identitet Ohn Telefon-Nummer
how_it_works.step3.description: Anders vi andre shmues-apps, fregt OpenChat keyn telefon-nummer far a konto. Dos shutzt dayne privatkeyt un makht der service zuganklich far yeder mit a internet-verkher – mit sichere identitetn basirt af kriptografishe kleys.
how_it_works.step4.title: Open Source Entviklung
how_it_works.step4.description: Der kode fun OpenChat iz aleyn open source, az yeder ken oyskiken, farshteyn zayn sicherhayt un bakumen ferbesserungen. Di tsuzamenarbeyt shtelt sicher az di platform blaybt zicher, on-oyfgeheybt, un fray fun geheymn vulnerabilities.
cta.section_description: Treyt tsu di sichere shmues revolutsye haynt. Deployir dayn eygene OpenChat instance oder lern mer vi es arbeyt.
footer.copyright: © 2025 OpenChat. Ale rekht farbylt. Open source sichere shmues far alemen.
railway.title: Railway Templet Deploymunt Gaid
railway.subtitle: Lants dir eygene OpenChat onzuvayzn, ohn az du verlierst dayn kop! Nisht fregn, oyb du host nokh keyn fancy deploy gehat vi a tweet – di gid vet dir makhn a deploymunt zauberer shneler vi du ken zogn "Vu iz der undo knop?"
railway.step1.title: Registrir dir af Railway
railway.step1.intro: Farbeyt, du darfst bashteyen a konto af Railway:
railway.step1.list.item1: Klick af der "Deploy on Railway" knop fun di unter in di gid.
railway.step1.list.item2: Op der Railway seyt, klick af "Sign Up" in der oytserre reytn hoek.
railway.step1.list.item3: Zukhn "Continue with Email" fun di opshn.
railway.step1.list.item4: Dann klick af "Continue with Google" tsu registrirn mit dayn Google konto.
railway.step1.list.item5: Mach tzu di Google auth process.
railway.step1.joke: Vu hot der developir gehat oysgeyn? Viln zayn, er hot aleyn gevust zayn cache! Nisht fregn, Railway hot fil cache far dayn app.
railway.step1.note: Notiz: Railway darft a konto tsu deployn templates. Zikh tsu shteyen mit Google – es iz der shnelster veg, afile du nist nokh mit piganers far email.
railway.step2.title: Deployir der Templet
railway.step2.intro: Nakh der login vest du vegn tsu di templet deploymunt seyt:
railway.step2.list.item1: Zayk di details fun templet un di setup opshn.
railway.step2.list.item2: Klick af der "Deploy" knop tsu onhebn der deploy process.
railway.step2.list.item3: Railway vet dir fregn tsu makhn a nay project mit dem templet.
railway.step2.list.item4: Di default settings zaynen geveyn tsu di meiste benutzer.
railway.step2.joke: Ikh hob gezegt fun mayn komp'yuter az ikh hob a break fun deploy. Er hot gefregt, hob ikh probirt tsu onhebn un oyfhebn. Klassiker IT humor!
railway.step2.note: Tip: Oyb du darfst customize di environment variables oder andre settings, du ken dos ton afile dem deploy. Bloyz, nemt nisht di nomen fun dayne pets – dos makht debug awkward.
railway.step3.title: Vayte af tsu der deploy kumen
railway.step3.intro: Railway vet itso initsializn un deployir dayn project:
railway.step3.list.item1: Du vest zayn a progress indicator vos zeigt der status fun deploy.
railway.step3.list.item2: Der system vet provision resources, install dependencies un build dayn app.
railway.step3.list.item4: Du vest zayn a grine checkmark (✓) ven der deploy iz successful.
railway.step3.joke: Deploy progress bars zaynen vi mikrowellen eten – zey geyen tsurik af 90% in sekunden, un den nemen zey di letzte 10% vi a ewichkeit. Zeit tsu nemen a kaffe!
railway.step3.note: Vichtig: Zay nisht tsu makhn tsu tsu closing der browser tab während der deploy. Dos geit af in background, ober dayn anxiety level ken vaksn 200%.
railway.step4.title: Zayk dayn Deploy URL
railway.step4.intro: Ven der deploy iz ful, ken du bashteyn dayn app:
railway.step4.list.item1: Zukhn der "Deployments" sektsye in dayn project dashboard.
railway.step4.list.item3: Klick af der deploy tsu zein details.
railway.step4.list.item4: Zukhn der "Domains" sektsye tsu fayn dayn app URL.
railway.step4.list.item5: Der URL vet zein vi: https://dayn-proyekt-name.railway.app
railway.step4.joke: Dayn nay URL iz vi dayn app's ershte heymadres. Shik a virtual housewarming party invite tsu ale dayne developer chaverim!
railway.step4.note: Success: Dayn app iz nun live! Du ken teilen dayn URL mit andere tsu bashteyn dayn deployt project. Zolst dreyen a victory dance – mir vet nisht urteilen.
railway.step5.title: Monitor un Manage Dayn Proyekt
railway.step5.intro: Railway gevt tools tsu monitor un manage dayn deploy:
railway.step5.list.item1: Bruk di "Metrics" tab tsu zein resource usage un performance.
railway.step5.list.item2: Kuk in di "Logs" sektsye tsu troubleshoot any issues.
railway.step5.list.item3: Du ken makhn changes in dayn project configuration in di "Variables" sektsye.
railway.step5.list.item4: Oif advanced settings, shik di "Settings" tab.
railway.step5.joke: Oysgehalten di logs fun deploy iz vi a reality show far software engineers. 'Oy vey! Zog mir, vu iz der error? Ikh ken nisht gloybn es hot gemacht!'
railway.step5.note: Notiz: Railway bietet a generous free tier, ober du ken shteln upgrade far projects mit hohe resource requirements. Dayn app iz vi a growing teenager – it ken behovn more resources vi du hobst initially gedacht.
